mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticket ( member_id, schedule_id, reservation_id, name, first_name, last_name, phone_number, birthday, passport_number, passport_expiry_date, ticket_type, fare, seat_type, total_price ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{scheduleId}, #{reservationId}, #{name}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{phoneNumber}, #{birthday}, #{passportNumber}, #{passportExpiryDate}, #{ticketType}, #{fare}, #{seatType}, #{totalPrice} )
